import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './index.scss' import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetters' import Variables from '../../config' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faAngular, faCss3, faGitAlt, faHtml5, faJsSquare, faReact, } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons' const About = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') useEffect(() => { setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') }, 3000) }, []) return (

{Variables.aboutMe}

{Variables.confidence}

{Variables.selfDefinition}

) } export default About
